text: A wid iumnen! Ma tekkrem ar teallit, ssirdet udmawen nnwen, ifassen nnwen alamma d ti$wmao, saaddit ifassen illexsen $ef iqweooa nnwen, ssirdet ivaoen nnwen ar twelza. Ma tellam s loanaba, zzizdget. Ma tuvnem ne$ tunagem, ne$ iusa d yiwen segwen si ccicma, ne$ tennulem tilawin, ur tufim aman, ddmet akal zeddigen, saaddit ep $ef udmawen nnwen akked ifassen nnwen. Ur Ib$a ara Oebbi a kwen Iqelleq, maca Ib$a a kwen Izzizdeg, ad awen Itim l$it iS, amar a pesnemmrem
